job_details.Functieomschrijving:
IBM Data & AI DevOps team is responsible for creating automated processes to develop, test, deploy, and maintain software systems across the whole software development lifecycle. Whether you are working on projects internally or for a client, continuous integration and continuous deployment is critical to the success of IBM and our clients worldwide. At IBM, you will use the latest software development tools, techniques and approaches and work with leading minds in the industry to build solutions you can be proud of. IBM Data & AI Development team is looking for enthusiastic and talented DevOps engineer to join us. Our services belong to IBM Knowledge Catalog product portfolio, tightly integrated with IBM Cloud Pak for Data where customers can access a suite of leading data and AI capabilities in a unified experience., As a DevOps engineer you will be responsible for design, development, maintenance and support of the IBM
   Knowledge Catalog services through the full systems development lifecycle on both SaaS and Hybrid Cloud
   platforms . You will work in an agile, collaborative environment, adhering to industry best practices for quality,
   performance, scalability, resiliency and security. You are curious to learn as demonstrated by your up-to-date
   technical knowledge and demonstrated ongoing learning. You are a good team player, self-directed, with working
   knowledge of Agile methodologies and principles. We seek an applicant who will thrive in an open, dynamic,
   flexible, fun, spirited, collaborative environment; an individual who desires creative freedom and the opportunity to
   work in a high performing team.

   As a DevOps engineer, you will contribute to a thriving and growing DevOps Engineering team. You will
   work in a Kubernetes based micro services environment to support our bleeding edge cloud services. This
   will include custom solutions, as well as open source DevOps tools (build and deploy automation,
   monitoring and data gathering for our software delivery pipeline). You will also be contributing to our continuous improvement and continuous delivery while increasing maturity of DevOps and agile adoption
   practices.
job_details.full_text:
DevOps engineer

IBM Data & AI DevOps team is responsible for creating automated processes to develop, test, deploy, and maintain software systems across the whole software development lifecycle. Whether you are working on projects internally or for a client, continuous integration and continuous deployment is critical to the success of IBM and our clients worldwide. At IBM, you will use the latest software development tools, techniques and approaches and work with leading minds in the industry to build solutions you can be proud of. IBM Data & AI Development team is looking for enthusiastic and talented DevOps engineer to join us. Our services belong to IBM Knowledge Catalog product portfolio, tightly integrated with IBM Cloud Pak for Data where customers can access a suite of leading data and AI capabilities in a unified experience., As a DevOps engineer you will be responsible for design, development, maintenance and support of the IBM
   Knowledge Catalog services through the full systems development lifecycle on both SaaS and Hybrid Cloud
   platforms . You will work in an agile, collaborative environment, adhering to industry best practices for quality,
   performance, scalability, resiliency and security. You are curious to learn as demonstrated by your up-to-date
   technical knowledge and demonstrated ongoing learning. You are a good team player, self-directed, with working
   knowledge of Agile methodologies and principles. We seek an applicant who will thrive in an open, dynamic,
   flexible, fun, spirited, collaborative environment; an individual who desires creative freedom and the opportunity to
   work in a high performing team.

   As a DevOps engineer, you will contribute to a thriving and growing DevOps Engineering team. You will
   work in a Kubernetes based micro services environment to support our bleeding edge cloud services. This
   will include custom solutions, as well as open source DevOps tools (build and deploy automation,
   monitoring and data gathering for our software delivery pipeline). You will also be contributing to our continuous improvement and continuous delivery while increasing maturity of DevOps and agile adoption
   practices.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional DevOps practices, automation, CI/CD, and managing software systems in a Kubernetes environment. While it mentions 'Data & AI DevOps team' and 'IBM Knowledge Catalog product portfolio' which involves data and AI capabilities, it does not detail specific tasks related to building, fine-tuning, or deploying generative AI models, RAG systems, or advanced prompt engineering. The core responsibilities described align more with general software engineering and operations rather than specialized AI/ML engineering roles like ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer. Therefore, it falls under the 'Ambiguous' category as it's primarily a DevOps role with a focus on AI-related products but not the core AI development itself.

job_tasks.justification: The job description repeatedly mentions 'DevOps engineer', 'automated processes to develop, test, deploy, and maintain software systems', 'continuous integration and continuous deployment', 'Kubernetes based micro services environment', 'build and deploy automation', 'monitoring and data gathering for our software delivery pipeline', and 'continuous improvement and continuous delivery'. These are all core aspects of MLOps and general DevOps.
The description explicitly states 'continuous integration and continuous deployment is critical to the success of IBM and our clients worldwide.'

The role involves 'design, development, maintenance and support of the IBM Knowledge Catalog services through the full systems development lifecycle' and working in a 'Kubernetes based micro services environment'. This indicates building and maintaining software systems.
job_tasks.phrase: design, development, maintenance and support of the IBM Knowledge Catalog services

job_tasks.justification: The role requires working in a 'Kubernetes based micro services environment' and managing 'custom solutions, as well as open source DevOps tools (build and deploy automation, monitoring and data gathering for our software delivery pipeline)'.
The job explicitly mentions contributing to 'continuous improvement and continuous delivery while increasing maturity of DevOps and agile adoption practices.'

The role is within the 'IBM Data & AI DevOps team' and supports 'IBM Knowledge Catalog product portfolio, tightly integrated with IBM Cloud Pak for Data', indicating an understanding of the business context and product suite.

soft_skills.phrase: curious to learn as demonstrated by your up-to-date technical knowledge and demonstrated ongoing learning
thrive in an open, dynamic, flexible, fun, spirited, collaborative environment
desires creative freedom and the opportunity to work in a high performing team
